column2: I never was in a better-steering ship, most especially in moderate weather.
column3: I never was in a better steering ship, most especially in moderate weather.

column2: Captain Robbins, Mr. Kite, bear a hand up; the bloody proas are aboard us!"
column3: Captain Robbins, mr Kite, bear a hand up; the bloody proas are aboard us!"

column2: I expected now to hear the guns discharged in quick succession, but they were got ready only, not fired.
column3: I expected now to hear the guns discharged in quick succession, but they were got ready only, not fired.

column2: The stillness that reigned on both sides was like that of death.
column3: The stillness that reigned on both sides was like that of death.

column2: The question was, now, whether we could pass them or not before they got near enough to grapple.
column3: The question was, now, whether we could pass them or not before they got near enough to grapple.

column2: The captain behaved perfectly well in this critical instant, commanding a dead silence, and the closest attention to his orders.
column3: The captain behaved perfectly well in this critical instant, commanding a dead silence, and the closest attention to his orders.

column2: I doubt if we touched a man in the nearest proa.
column3: I doubt if we touched a man in the nearest proa.
